{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Argus Technologies |model=EW-2101 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/20/2001 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=NYT-WL200103 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B;ARM, SAMSUNG 052B, S3C4510B01-QER0; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=2 MiB |ram1_brand=AMIC |ram1_model=A43L0616V-6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit), |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861B |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8019AS |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=UART with FIFO buffer;EPIC;Ei16C550;EPIC, Ei16C550-CJ44, 0034;1;CMOS;44-pin PLCC; ,,, CPLD;Altera;EPM3032A;ALTERA, EPM3032ALC44-10, T BAD490049A;1;;44-pin PLCC; |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Wireless |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "JOE.H", "AGS:200103 Ver. 0B", and "Broadband Router+LAN Wireless" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Noted covered models in the FCC test report are as follows... *WR-2201 *EW-2100 *EW-2101 *WA-601 *WA-2201 (appears to be the '''JAHT''' WA-2201 / WA2201)
The default SSID for this device is presumed to be '''Wireless'''. It is the SSID shown in the manual.
The power adapter specified as used in the FCC docs is a '''Touch''' SP9715-A (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.6A -> 5VDC, 2.0A).
